name: CommandPlugin
description: Listens for websocket connections from the TMX admin portal and processes commands

configuration.description: The length of milliseconds to sleep between processing all messages.
The path to the directory containing the SSL key and certificate files.
The maximum number of rows returned for the initial Event Log query.
The path to the directory where downloaded files will be saved.
The log level for this plugin

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provided, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.
